name: Finalization of setoff; credit on debt
text: Upon completion of the hearing and appeal process set out in section 231-54, or upon the debtor's failure to timely request a hearing pursuant to that section, the setoff shall become final.  The amount of the setoff after deduction of any charge authorized by section 231-56 shall be credited by the claimant agency against the debtor's debt. [L 1982, c 199, pt of §1]
